00062 void Container::Render(const Camera& camera)
00063 {
00064         Process_removals();
00065         std::sort(entities.begin(), entities.end());
00066         for (Entities::iterator i = entities.begin(); i != entities.end(); ++i)
00067         {
00068                 (*i)->Render(camera);
00069         }
00070 }

00084 void Container::Pick_up(Vector from, float r, Container* to, bool all)
00085 {
00086         Process_removals();
00087         for (Entities::iterator i = entities.begin(); i != entities.end(); ++i)
00088         {
00089                 Vector diff = from - (*i)->Get_position();
00090                 float length = diff.Length();
00091                 if (length <= r)
00092                 {
00093                         if ((*i)->Pick_up(to) && !all)
00094                                 break;
00095                 }
00096         }
00097 }

00099 
00100 void Container::Interact(Vector from, float r, Container* to)
00101 {
00102         Process_removals();
00103         for (Entities::iterator i = entities.begin(); i != entities.end(); ++i)
00104         {
00105                 Vector diff = from - (*i)->Get_position();
00106                 float length = diff.Length();
00107                 if (length <= r)
00108                 {
00109                         if ((*i)->Interact(to))
00110                                 break;
00111                 }
00112         }
00113 }
00114 
00115 
00116 void Container::Process_removals()
00117 {
00118         for (Entities::iterator i = removals.begin(); i != removals.end(); ++i)
00119         {
00120                 entities.erase(std::find(entities.begin(), entities.end(), *i));
00121         }
00122         removals.clear();
00123 }
